name: Avery Hole in: Journey to the Center of the Hole
name_original: Avery Hole in: Journey to the Center of the Hole
description:
You are Captain Avery Hole, and your mission is to journey to the center of the hole. You are joined by your wife/scientist Dr. Abigail Hole and your good boy doggie Arthur Hole. Can you make it to the center of the hole?

Find out in this SHMUP / PLATFORMER.

this game is totally SFW

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020 in February 2020.

Code/Art/Unity - Morgan Carlson @morgancarls0n

Sprites/Tiles - Josh Horner @tree.speak

Music/SFX - Andy Wiseman @andywisemanmusic
